Trial_Design.evidence: In this phase II and pharmacodynamic study, patients with recurrent GBM received RO4929097 in a study of 2 groups.

Intervention.evidence: patients with recurrent GBM received RO4929097 in a study of 2 groups.

Objective.evidence: To estimate the 6-mo progression-free survival rate (PFS 6 ) in patients with progressive GBM and to inhibit by 50% the generation of neurospheres in fresh tissue resected from patients treated with RO4929097.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Endpoints included PFS 6 and the inhibition of neurosphere formation in the resected tumor samples.

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of 47 patients received treatment, 7 of whom had tumor resection.

Number_Analysed.evidence: A total of 47 patients received treatment, 7 of whom had tumor resection.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The PFS 6 was 4%, and the inhibition of neurosphere formation occurred in 1 of 7 patient samples.
